sys_update_version.name: sys_transform_script_3d3039ed2f9420100a8bd39df699b611
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_script"><sys_transform_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><map display_value="Cisco CBP Details TM">86156c652f5020100a8bd39df699b612</map><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[(function runTransformScript(source, map, log, target /*undefined onStart*/ ) {
	/*var logger = new Cisco_BCS_SNLogger();
    var daoScript = new Cisco_DAOScript();
    try {
        logger.debug("Inside CBP Details transform map.");
        var sys_id = daoScript.getReferenceMapping("cbpRules", "bp_rule_id", target.bp_rule_id);
        target.cbp_rule = sys_id;

        var sys_id_device = daoScript.getReferenceMapping("devices", "device_id", target.device_id);
        target.device = sys_id_device;

        target.update();
    } catch (e) {
        logger.error("Exception caught inside CBP Details transform map. Error : - " + e);
    }*/

	var dao = new Cisco_DAOScript();

	// Devices
	var resultDevices = dao.createReferences(target.device_id, "device_id", "", target.sys_id, "x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_devices", false);
	if(resultDevices){
		target.device = resultDevices + "";
		target.update();
	}

	// CBP Rules 
	var resultCbpRules = dao.createReferences(target.bp_rule_id, "bp_rule_id", "", target.sys_id, "x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_cbp_rules", false);
	if(resultCbpRules){
		target.cbp_rule = resultCbpRules + "";
		target.update();
	}

	calculatedFieldValue = dao.calculateField("x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_cbp_details","","device_id=" + target.device_id + "");

	dao.updateCalculatedField("x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_devices","device_id="+target.device_id+"","configuration_guidelines",calculatedFieldValue);


	// 	target.update();

})(source, map, log, target);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-11-05 13:48:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>3d3039ed2f9420100a8bd39df699b611</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onAfter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cisco BCS Operational Insights" source="x_caci_cisco_bcs">56b8d9362f3310108956ea5ef699b62d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Cisco BCS Operational Insights">56b8d9362f3310108956ea5ef699b62d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_3d3039ed2f9420100a8bd39df699b611</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-12-16 11:35:13</sys_updated_on><when>onAfter</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>
